Hello all!

I just started with the new .21 update, and I had a question. I know that now pods no longer function as an SAS module anymore. I have a very small satellite that I would like SAS on, but the current modules are way too big and mess up the look of my satellite. Is there some smaller module I missed, or am I going to just have to suck it up and use the big SAS modules?

Thanks!
